trans-unit.source: Represents a base class for classes that automatically generate fields for data-bound controls that use ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator"></xref> class.
Returns a list of the properties of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField"></xref> object.
The list of properties.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether enumeration fields should be generated by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator"></xref> instance.

If this flag is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator> instance uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class to determine the default behavior.
In that case, AutoGenerateEnumFields is set to `true` when <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> represents version 4.5 or later, and `false` in older versions.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if fields should be generated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates one or more autogenerated fields using the specified collection of field properties.

This method sets the header text and sort expression of the field to the `Name` value of `fieldProperties`, sets the `ReadOnly` property of the field to the `IsReadOnly` value of `fieldProperties`, and sets the `DataType` property of the field to the Type value of `fieldProperties`.
This method can be overridden to create a different field.
The list of properties to use when creating the field.
The autogenerated field.
When implemented in a derived class, creates autogenerated fields based on the current data item.
This method typically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties%2A> collection.
The current data item.
The data-bound control that will contain the autogenerated fields.
The autogenerated fields.
Creates <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> objects based on metadata information for the table.
This method can be overridden.
The data-bound control that will contain the autogenerated fields.
A collection of <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> objects.
Gets a value that indicates whether view state changes are being tracked.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if view state is being tracked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Loads the state that was saved previously using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator.SaveViewState*> method.
This method can be overridden.
The control state to restore.
Saves the changes to the class's state.
This method can be overridden.
The saved view state.
Gets a value that indicates whether view state changes are being tracked.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if view state is being tracked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Loads the state that was saved previously using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator.SaveViewState*> method.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
The view state changes saved previously.
Saves the changes to a class's state.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
The view state changes.
Instructs the class to track changes to its view state.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoFieldsGenerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
Instructs the class to track changes to its view state.
This method can be overridden.
